nodes.text: Star Wars Seasonal Storybook is an announced young-readers title from Disney–Lucasfilm Press. It was scheduled for September 18, 2018, but was never officially released.

The online retailer Amazon.com originally listed a September 5, 2017, publication date for the Star Wars Seasonal Storybook, which would have included the book among several titles released for that year's Force Friday Star Wars merchandise event. However, Amazon immediately listed the book as "temporarily out of stock" on that date. As of September 18, 2019, the online retailer Book Depository also lists the book as unavailable, and the listing on Books-A-Million has been removed.
